title: Use of the Website
text: You must be at least 18 years old to use this website or have the permission of a parent or legal guardian. You are responsible for ensuring that the information you provide is accurate, current, and complete. Shukra Jewellery reserves the right to refuse service, terminate accounts, or cancel orders at its sole discretion.

title: Product Information and Pricing
text: While we strive to provide accurate product information, including descriptions and pricing, errors may occur. Shukra Jewellery reserves the right to correct any errors and update information at any time. Prices are subject to change without notice. The price displayed at the time of purchase is the final and binding price.

title: Order Acceptance and Fulfillment
text: Your order constitutes an offer to purchase our products. Shukra Jewellery reserves the right to accept or decline your order at its discretion. Once an order is placed, you will receive an email confirmation. This confirmation does not constitute acceptance of your order; it is an acknowledgment that we have received your request. Shukra Jewellery reserves the right to cancel or limit the quantity of any order for any reason.

title: Returns and Exchanges
text: Please refer to our [Return and Exchange Policy](#) for information on returns and exchanges.

title: Intellectual Property
text: All content on this website, including but not limited to text, images, graphics, logos, and software, is the property of Shukra Jewellery and is protected by intellectual property laws

title: Privacy
text: Your use of this website is governed by our [Privacy Policy](#). Please review the policy to understand our practices regarding the collection and use of your personal information.

title: Limitation of Liability
text: Shukra Jewellery shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages resulting from the use or inability to use our products or services.

title: Governing Law
text: These Terms and Conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of [Your Jurisdiction]. Any disputes arising from or in connection with these terms shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in [Your Jurisdiction].

title: Changes to Terms and Conditions
text: Shukra Jewellery reserves the right to update and modify these Terms and Conditions at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting to the website.
